vendor_name: Kuredhivaru Resort & Spa Maldives (previously Mövenpick Resort Kuredhivaru Maldives)
title: Mövenpick Maldives Grand Opening with Return Seaplane Transfers and All-Inclusive Dining with Drinks
description: Be the first to experience the quintessential luxury of the brand new Mövenpick Resort Kuredhivaru Maldives, an impressive private island resort created by the brand behind the Swiss-style artisan ice cream and now one of the world's most upscale hospitality companies. Situated on a private island in the Noonu Atoll, you’ll experience ultimate VIP Maldives extravagance surrounded by a tropical paradise you won’t want to leave. Pamper yourself in a celebrity-grade Overwater Villa with a private plunge pool and indulge in return seaplane transfers, all-inclusive gourmet dining with drinks, a daily Mövenpick chocolate hour and more.
